files.name: main.py
files.content:
# Peterson, Holly - Mid Term Program 
# 2019-10-28

print("Planet Express Delivery Time Calculator")

print("")

maxSpeedTime = 1
isEven = 2
robotPlanet = "Robot Planet"

planet = input("What is the name of the planet? ")
distance = float(input("How many parsecs away? "))
packages = int(input("How many packages? "))
weight = float(input("How many tons does each package weigh? "))

if(distance < 1 or packages < 1 or weight <= 0):
    
    if(distance < 1):
        print("")
        print("Error:",planet,"must be one or more parsecs away.")
    
    if(packages < 1 ):
        print("")
        print("Error: The ship must carry at least one package.")

    if(weight <= 0):
        print("")
        print("Error: The package weight",weight,"is too light.")
    
else:
    
    print("")
    
    if(packages > 10 and (packages % isEven) == 1):
        packages = packages + 1 
        print("Warning: Adjusting package count to",packages)
        
    weightedTime = (weight*packages) + maxSpeedTime
    timeToPlanet = weightedTime*distance
    totalTime = timeToPlanet + (distance*maxSpeedTime)
        
    print("The total cargo weight is",packages*weight,"ton(s).")
    print("The trip to",planet,"will take",timeToPlanet,"minutes.")
    print("The trip back to Earth will take",distance,"minutes.")
    print("The total trip time is",totalTime,"minutes.")
    
    if(planet == robotPlanet): print("Also, Bender is great!")
